Ajax Requests

Echo apis are created to simulate Ajax calls: /echo/json/ for JSON, //jsfiddle.net/echo/jsonp/ for JSONP, /echo/html/ for HTML and /echo/xml/ for XML.

Please read API documentation and follow examples.
